thread.section_title: Hallowood Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hallowood Furniture | www.hallowood.co.uk
thread.title: Paul from Croydon
thread.title_full: Hallowood Furniture reviewed by Paul from Croydon

author: Paul from Croydon
title: Paul from Croydon
text: Really pleased with the furniture from the Camberley range, but the delivery company managed to damage the front of the sideboard despite the excellent packaging. The cardboard outer packaging was torn in many places and one of the other items was so wet the box had already started to fall apart when it arrived. A great product but someone needs to audit the delivery and warehousing side of the business.
